headline: Comcast Gears Up to Report Q2 Earnings: What's in the Cards?
summary: CMCSA's Q2 results are likely to reflect broadband losses, promo costs, and theme park headwinds ahead of its July 31 earnings release.

headline: Spotify CEO defends slower price hikes: ‘A lot better to keep the customer around’
summary: Spotify CEO Daniel Ek defended the company's measured approach to price increases, saying the strategy reflects a long-term focus on customer retention rather than short-term financial gain.

raw.headline: Spotify CEO defends slower price hikes: ‘A lot better to keep the customer around’
raw.summary: Spotify CEO Daniel Ek defended the company's measured approach to price increases, saying the strategy reflects a long-term focus on customer retention rather than short-term financial gain.

headline: TNS Half Year 2025 Robocall Report: Bad Actors Exploiting Non-IP Networks of Smaller Carriers
summary: RESTON, Va., July 29, 2025--New data, released today in the Transaction Network Services (TNS) 2025 Half Year Robocall Investigation Report, reveals that bad actors are increasingly able to exploit vulnerabilities within smaller carrier networks that have not fully migrated from legacy to all-IP networks.

raw.headline: TNS Half Year 2025 Robocall Report: Bad Actors Exploiting Non-IP Networks of Smaller Carriers
raw.summary: RESTON, Va., July 29, 2025--New data, released today in the Transaction Network Services (TNS) 2025 Half Year Robocall Investigation Report, reveals that bad actors are increasingly able to exploit vulnerabilities within smaller carrier networks that have not fully migrated from legacy to all-IP networks.

headline: Saudi Arabia Home Energy Management System Market Overview and Company Analysis Report 2025-2033 Featuring Honeywell, General Electric, Comcast, Panasonic, Johnson Controls, Schneider Electric, Bosc
summary: The Saudi Arabia Home Energy Management System (HEMS) market is set to surge, anticipating growth from US$ 43.62 Million in 2024 to US$ 145.69 Million by 2033, with a CAGR of 14.34% from 2025 to 2033. This growth is fueled by energy efficiency emphasis, smart home adoption, and government incentives under Vision 2030. HEMS aids in reducing energy costs and carbon emissions, aligning with global sustainability goals. Key technological advancements like AI and IoT enhance system efficiency. Challe
